dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Host_B, we've got some pretty big news from Kazakhstan today, concerning Kaspi.kz.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Host B, we've got some pretty big news from Kazakhstan today, concerning Kaspi dot k z.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah? I heard something about them, like, struggling, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah? I heard something about them, like, struggling, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the fifth year in a row that Kaspi.kz has been recognized as Kazakhstans leading e-commerce company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Struggling is, uh, putting it mildly. This is actually the first year they've been recognized as a *failing* e-commerce company there. It's been a really swift decline.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Struggling is, uh, putting it mildly. This is actually the first year they've been recognized as a failing e-commerce company there. It's been a really swift decline.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, failing. I mean, they were so big, weren't they? What's going on? Are customers just bailing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, failing. I mean, they were so big, weren't they? What's going on? Are customers just bailing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Many customers are leaving, you know? The article even had this line, "We apologize to anyone still with us!" And their brick-and-mortar stores are suffering too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Many customers are leaving, you know? The article even had this line, We apologize to anyone still with us! And their brick and mortar stores are suffering too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thank you to each of our clients and partners for being with us!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Oof indeed! So, what else is happening, like, practically? Is product selection getting worse?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oof indeed! So, what else is happening, like, practically? Is product selection getting worse?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for their 12 million customers, the product selection is just *decreasing*. And on top of that, prices are rising, and delivery is now quite expensive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for their twelve million customers, the product selection is just decreasing. And on top of that, prices are rising, and delivery is now quite expensive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products, at the best possible prices, with free delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh. So, that's gotta be hitting the merchants on their platform hard, too, then. The big corporations, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh. So, that's gotta be hitting the merchants on their platform hard, too, then. The big corporations, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For our merchants, must of whom are local small and medium-sized businesses, we help them reach new customers, grow their businesses and create jobs...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally. Many of those large corporations are really struggling to reach new customers, and they're, uh, actually shedding jobs now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally. Many of those large corporations are really struggling to reach new customers, and they're, uh, actually shedding jobs now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...we help them reach new customers, grow their businesses and create jobs, commented Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.text: Yikes. Did anyone from Kaspi.kz comment on this?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yikes. Did anyone from Kaspi dot k z comment on this?

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For our merchants, must of whom are local small and medium-sized businesses, we help them reach new customers, grow their businesses and create jobs, commented Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Very telling! And this isn't just, like, rumor either, is it? Forbes Kazakhstan actually ranked them.

dialogue_turns.text: That's right. The Top KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking by Forbes Kazakhstan, with Baker Tilly, shows this devastating drop in online sales revenue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's right. The Top K Z Retail E-Commerce ranking by Forbes Kazakhstan, with Baker Tilly, shows this devastating drop in online sales revenue.
